lines.text: I mean, that hologram... Slick there is firing a gun, right?
What, you think the hologram shot 'im?
Well... it's gotta be related, right? Somehow?
How 'bout you get back to me when you've figured out that ''somehow''?
Uh, I think it's got something to do with that Living Memory spell...
Uh... maybe. Let's go over that ''some kind of hologram'' question, first, so I can explain.
Dude, we've been over this. The hologram is basically a photo of the crime scene.
Slick Emmup fired his gun, at where the wizard's lying dead in a pool of his own blood.
I'm no expert, but I think maybe he shot him!
What about those robes? Looks like they’ve been burnt. You don’t think he died from the fire?
Eh… probably not. The scorch marks don’t really reach the rest of him- it’s just the clothes.
I doubt this guy even got burned, much less, like… burned up.
Hm. Guess you’re right, there. Let’s go with that for now.
